Articles.Content:
For anyone wondering, The pack still works in 1.8.x Kop.

I also Rigged Cerillion's boulderCo cloud dependicies to my folder so I don't have to install BoulderCo because why not.

I'm also using this with version 1.8.  So far I'm not finding Easter Eggs, unless they are the arch plants.  What objects am I looking for and what planet or moons should I be looking at in more detail?  Thanks.  Since this thread is old, is there a newer discussion thread?

Man, I really miss this mod, as well as Planet Cyran.

I wonder if @The White Guardian is still working on that overhaul.

This is a really good pack; if it gets redone well, it could definitely get some publicity.

Edited September 29, 2020 by Maple Kerman

On 2/11/2020 at 11:36 AM, Shawn Kerman said:

For anyone wondering, The pack still works in 1.8.x Kop.

I also Rigged Cerillion's boulderCo cloud dependicies to my folder so I don't have to install BoulderCo because why not.

Curiosity has me wonder if it works with the latest builds.

On 9/29/2020 at 7:21 AM, Maple Kerman said:

Man, I really miss this mod, as well as Planet Cyran.

I wonder if @The White Guardian is still working on that overhaul.

This is a really good pack; if it gets redone well, it could definitely get some publicity.

It's currently been shelved in favor of KS3P, since it is more versatile. They're both planet packs that I really would like to revise though, especially since I now have the programming insight to add PQSMods if the built-in ones don't suffice.

Does anyone know if this works in 1.12? It probably doesn't but if it is just a simple config fix it would be nice to use it, it looks pretty cool and i'm pretty sure this is probably dead forever, so at least if it worked enough to just load in 1.12 it would be nice...
